single_cell_parser¶

cell parser and synapse mapper for single cell simulations with NeuroNet subcellular synapse distributions

Functions

build_parameters(filename[, …])

create_cell(parameters[, scaleFunc, …])

default way of creating NEURON cell models; includes spatial discretization and inserts biophysical mechanisms according to parameter file

init_neuron_run(simparam[, vardt])

Default NEURON run with inital parameters according to parameter file.

load_NMODL_parameters(parameters)

automatically loads NMODL mechanisms from paths in parameter file

sec_distance_to_soma(currentSec)

compute path length from sec(x=0) to soma

spines_update_network_paramfile(…)

update the network.param file to point to the new synapse distribution file

spines_update_synapse_distribution_file(…)

Update the .syn file to correctly point to spine heads as excitatory synapse locations.

Classes

Event(func)

In-Silico Framework (ISF)
